title: Mac/PC
alt: It's fun to watch browsers fumblingly recapitulate the history of window management. Someday we'll have xmonad as a Firefox extension.
transcript:
[Two Cueballs stand facing out of the screen.]
Mac: I'm a Mac
PC: And I'm a PC.
Mac & PC, together: And since you do everything through a browser now, we're pretty indistinguishable.
